narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Formka Johnson is a Social Worker provider based in Baltimore, MD. From 2022-03 through 2023-11, this provider received $296K in Medicaid payments across 3K claims serving 867 beneficiaries, billing 3 distinct procedure codes.

narrative.title: Key Findings
items: 98% of all billing comes from a single procedure code: 90834 (90834). This extreme concentration is unusual and may indicate specialized services or a narrow billing pattern.
Billing stopped in 2023-11, suggesting this provider is no longer active in Medicaid. Abrupt cessation of billing can be a risk indicator.
